description: Stockimg is an all in one design and content creation tool powered by AI. You can easily generate logo, illustration, wallpaper, poster and more.
title: Stockimg AI
keywords: photo generator,stock image,logo,logo generator image,online image editing software,illustration,design media and templates,Stockimg
introduction: Stockimg.ai is an AI design tool that allows users to generate wallpapers, stock images, logos, posters, illustrations, book covers, and QR codes with artificial intelligence. It offers commercial use rights for the images produced.
features: Generate wallpapers, stock images, logos, posters, illustrations, book covers, and QR codes with AI
Commercial use rights for images produced

faqs.question: Will I be able to use my credits in all categories?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can generate design/image as you wish from the active categories.

faqs.question: Do I own the copyrights of the images I generate?
faqs.answer: All our subscriptions packages have commercial use rights. You can use the images you produce for commercial and non-commercial purposes.
